name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Aibuster - Ai Auto Blogging and Ai Content Generation Tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Aibuster is a Ai Auto Blogging Content Creation & Generation Extension. Aibuster is the best ai tools for blogging and content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to AI Buster, your simple solution for easy blogging and content creation! This Chrome extension uses powerful technology to help you quickly write great articles. 

With AI Buster, you can make changes on the fly, choose from 24 languages, and even add pictures and videos. It's perfect for anyone who wants to save time and make blogging a breeze. 

Get started in just a few clicks and see how AI Buster can change the way you create content!


➤ AI Auto Blogging Extension Features:

1) Users will enter their own OpenAI API key. When users click on "GPT 3.5" (see the image below), the main settings for selecting the model will be displayed.
2) Day and Night Option.
3) After clicking the "Generate Article" button, a loading spinner will appear. Shortly thereafter, the full article will be displayed with an "HTML Editor," allowing users to make adjustments in real time.
4) You can enable or disable images and videos from the Content Generation Form. If you turn off images or videos, they will not appear in the article.
5) You can set the 'Article Tone' and 'Point of View' before generating an article.
6) You can also set the 'Article Type'.
7) Articles can be generated in 24 languages.
8) You can select between GPT-3.5 and GPT-4 modes from the Extension options.
9) You can add your own API key to generate unlimited articles for free.

➤ How it Works

When I add your 'Keyword,' articles are generated by making requests to the ChatGPT API, then delivering a complete article. All articles are SEO-friendly.

➤ Using the AI Buster Extension is easy, and installation takes mere seconds:

✅ Click ‘Add to Chrome’ 
✅ Click on the extensions icon, and pin the 'Aibuster - AI Auto Blogging & Content Generation' Extension to the extensions bar
✅ Start using the 'Aibuster - AI Auto Blogging & Content Generation' Extension.
